scripts.project-setup: yarn clean:remove && yarn && react-native link && yarn pods
scripts.start: yarn start:ios && yarn start:ios:8 && yarn start:android
scripts.pods: yarn && cd ios && pod install && cd ..
scripts.build:android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.build:apk:debug: ./android/gradlew --stop && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleDebugJsAndAssets copyDebugBundledJs assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.build:apk:staging: ./android/gradlew --stop && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleStagingJsAndAssets copyStagingBundledJs assembleStaging && cd ..
scripts.build:apk:release: ./android/gradlew --stop && npx jetify && cd android && ./gradlew clean bundleReleaseJsAndAssets copyReleaseBundledJs assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.start:android:clean: ./android/gradlew --stop && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx jetify && react-native run-android
scripts.start:android:clean:device: ./android/gradlew --stop && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx jetify && react-native run-android --deviceId
scripts.clean:android: ./android/gradlew --stop && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx jetify
